Structs/BasicAuthentication.html.name: BasicAuthentication
Structs/BasicAuthentication.html.abstract: Basic authentication information extracted from request header “Authorization”

Structs/BearerAuthentication.html.name: BearerAuthentication
Structs/BearerAuthentication.html.abstract: Bearer authentication information extracted from request header “Authorization”

Protocols/HBAuthenticator.html#/s:15Humm.name: authenticate(request:)
Protocols/HBAuthenticator.html#/s:15Humm.abstract: Called by middleware to see if request is authenticated.

Protocols/HBAuthenticator.html#/s:15Humm.name: apply(to:next:)
Protocols/HBAuthenticator.html#/s:15Humm.abstract: Calls authenticate and if it returns a valid autheniticatable object login with this object

Protocols.html#/s:15HummingbirdAuth17HBA.name: HBAuthenticatable
Protocols.html#/s:15HummingbirdAuth17HBA.abstract: Protocol for objects that can be returned by an HBAuthenticator.

Protocols/HBAuthenticator.html.name: HBAuthenticator
Protocols/HBAuthenticator.html.abstract: Authenticators are middleware that are used to check if a request is authenticated and then augment the request with the

Extensions/HBRequest/Auth.html#/s:11Humm.name: login(_:)
Extensions/HBRequest/Auth.html#/s:11Humm.abstract: Login with authenticatable object. Make object available to request via Auth.get

Extensions/HBRequest/Auth.html#/s:11Humm.name: logout(_:)
Extensions/HBRequest/Auth.html#/s:11Humm.abstract: Logout authenticatable object. Removes object from request

Extensions/HBRequest/Auth.html#/s:11Humm.name: has(_:)
Extensions/HBRequest/Auth.html#/s:11Humm.abstract: Return if request is authenticated with type

Enums/Bcrypt.html.name: Bcrypt
Enums/Bcrypt.html.abstract: Bcrypt is a password-hashing function designed by Niels Provos and David Mazi√®res, based on the Blowfish cipher
